data.eml:eml: Sedges in the mist: A new species of Lepidosperma (Cyperaceae, Schoeneae) from the mountains of Tasmania

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Plunkett, George T., Wilson, Karen L., Bruhl, Jeremy J. (2013): Sedges in the mist: A new species of Lepidosperma (Cyperaceae, Schoeneae) from the mountains of Tasmania. PhytoKeys 28: 19-59, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.28.5592, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.28.5592
